product_name: Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage - Women's - 25" - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Easily negotiate airports with the 25-in. Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage. The upright bag features 4 multidirectional spinner wheels that freely roll without much effort on your part.
short_description: Easily negotiate airports with the 25-in. Sherpani Hemisphere Wheeled Luggage. The upright bag features 4 multidirectional spinner wheels that freely roll without much effort on your part.
